reviews.review_msg: He very helpful, offers office hours, have in class discussions.  You won't feel boring during the 2-hour lecture.  He has clear grading criteria, and he gives feedback on your writing.  Only 500 words portfolio, no long essay! Attendance matters, need to sign the attendance sheets.

He is very boring. Not that interested in his students. Consistently late, his phone even rang during a group presentation. Really easy class. Very easy to get an A+ if you are a good writer and need a slightly less challenging course.

This was the easiest class I have ever taken in my life! Tim was a fantastic guy who has a pure passion for education; the lectures can be dry, but I'd rather sit in on a class in which I understood what was going on, then be dumbfounded the entire time. A huge online component, but the largest essay we had to write was only 700 words. AWESOME !

Relies on group discussions too much to fuel class time.  While it is a designated W class, he doesn't help you develop your writing,  bc of how the class is structured, nor are the essay topics asking you actual questions. He is also a really dry lecturer & pauses a bit too much. Wouldn't take a class with him again unless I had to.
